attributes.action: Make all G4S officers take mental health training as part of their training.
attributes.additional_details: One in four adults in the UK will suffer from depression at least once in their lifetimes.
attributes.background: In today's society where there has been an increase in individuals with mental  health issues. After being wrongful discriminated against and after seeing the abuse to mentally vulnerable people by G4S staff, I believe that G4S staff should have at least a basic mental health training.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for G4S. You could start a petition requiring mental health training for all security officers if they hold a government contract.
